Faq.1: Can I market the product in a different destination if it is available in one country ?
Faq.2: Products can only be promoted if they are available in the same country. For instance, a product that is only available in Saudi Arabia cannot be sold in the UAE, Kuwait, or any other country.
Faq.3: What is the minimum amount that can be withdrawn ?
Faq.4: The minimum payment is $100 for Gulf countries and $20 for Morocco.
Faq.5: What are the conditions for accepting my account ?
Faq.6: All information must be correct and a copy of national identity card or passport are required.
Faq.7: How do we approve the offers request ?
Faq.8: It depends of the available quantity in each public offer.
Faq.9: Are there ways to promote offers instead of a referral link ?
Faq.10: In addition to referral links, we provide many platforms and solutions, such as YouCan, Woocommerce and Shopify. (Tutorials on our Youtube Channel).
Faq.13: Is it possible to use a single WooCommerce or YouCan store for multiple countries ?
Faq.14: The offer currency must match the currency used in the store. Therefore, each country should have its own store.
